snippet: Lawyers in the trial of Officer Peter Liang, accused of killing an innocent man in a housing project, grappled with the shooting of two officers on a similar patrol.
abstract: Bronx shooting of New York Police Officers Diara E Cruz and Patrick Espeut reverberates at manslaughter trial of Officer Peter Liang, who shot unarmed man Akai Gurley during stairwell patrol in Brooklyn housing project in 2014; latest incident could be seen as bolstering defense's case that such patrols are inherently perilous and that Liang's decision to unholster his weapon before entering stairwell was reasonable.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers in the trial of Officer Peter Liang, accused of killing an innocent man in a housing project, grappled with the shooting of two officers on a similar patrol.
